sentence.Network_en: In the joking commences a rottenness.
sentence.Network_cn: 一开玩笑就会出现不好的苗头.

sentence.Network_en: The fraudulent money system today is the source of all the rottenness.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天,欺诈的货币体系是所有腐败的根源.

sentence.Network_en: The rottenness in football shocked even the unshakeable Mr Rossi.
